WHY U.C HUB?

Uni is very overwhelming, we all need help for a better experience

Become a better student with your personal accountability partner, who will help you with the challenges you face as a student, and track your progress as you go.

Ineffective lectures, expensive and inconvenient tutorials, lack of reliable materials, distractions, work, and bad time management can no longer stop you!

Learn from a senior in your field of study

Get the most effective tutoring, mentoring, tips and tricks from a coach that can relate with you.

With UC Hub, you can easily find a like-minded coach.

When your coach has similar experience with you, they can better guide you through your challenges and give you coping strategies.

We’ll give you a list of like-minded coaches to choose from. A list of colleagues that best suit your preferences.
Then you pick who you want to coach you.

Convenient and effective studying, physically and virtually.

You and your coach decide when you learn, physically or virtually.

With video and audio calls, a virtual whiteboard, resources storage, chat features for communication, and other tools, virtual learning on UC Hub is just as fun and effective.

Studying with friends is definitely more fun.

U.C Hub has the option for getting group coaching with your friends.

Your personal accountability partner

Find one who is eager to help, with ease on UC Hub. You get a coach, a study buddy, an accountability partner, someone you can ask all your questions, a friend, and more.

Finding a personal coach or a senior to get tips from can be daunting.

Group Coaching with Uc Hub

You’d rather be coached with a few of your friends? Sure, we’ve got that covered too. Make your learning more fun by learning together.

YEAH, YOU SHOULD JOIN US AT UC HUB

Just need help studying for that exam? We’ve got a coach for you.

We are driving inclusiveness in academic excellence by providing all students with help unique to their challenges.
